name: Multiplayer Zone {Open Beta}
description:
Here it is !  our best game beta version is available on itch.io 

This game should be multiplayer if you tested it reply did multiplayer work with you or not and you will get the full game for free

a PVP game and Survival from zombies your choice will make the game fun

you chose to kill all players and Zombies in the zombies city !


or just Co-op with players to kill zombies until the end

Find Weapons That Hidden around the map and start fighting

This is our first game Not Perfect But Good!

Wait for our professional games coming soon Check our youtube channel or join our discord Server : https://discord.gg/v75ReY2
